20110131131806.000|20110131131808.000|CC1|>> LET'S STAY WITH THE SUBJECT. 
20110131131808.000|20110131131809.000|CC1|EARLIER I SPOKE TO A DIRECTOR OF
20110131131809.000|20110131131811.000|CC1|THE MIDDLE EAST CENTER OF THE

20110131131824.000|20110131131825.000|CC1|SHORT TERM.

20110131131828.000|20110131131830.000|CC1|PSYCHOLOGY OF THE MARKET.
